argument.name: searchDefinition
argument.description: A JSON object specifing the field to search and a Regular Expression for the value to search for, or a function that returns true/false. To clear the filter, set *[js:searchDefinition]* to *[js:false]*.

page.description: Performs a client-side search of the data in a List and displays matching rows.
page.note: If you want to search all columns, use the .filterListClientSide() method.
